## Model.findById() method

Finds a single document by its \_id field. findById(id) is almost\* equivalent to findOne(<!-- -->{ \_id: id }<!-- -->). findById() triggers findOne hooks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findById<T extends Document>(this: Ctor<T>, id: any | string | number, callback?: (err: any, res: T | null) => void): DocumentQuery<T | null, T, QueryHelpers> & QueryHelpers;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Ctor](./goosetyped.ctor.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |
|  id | any \| string \| number | value of \_id to query by |
|  callback | (err: any, res: T \| null) =&gt; void |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

DocumentQuery&lt;T \| null, T, QueryHelpers&gt; &amp; QueryHelpers
